p: Surprisingly, despite their high similarity, the binding cavities of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 Mpros showed significantly different MAV (Wald test, z = 2597, p < 0.05). Both proteins reduced their MAV upon inhibitor binding by approximately 20%, but the maximal volume of SARS-CoV was over 50% larger than those of SARS-CoV-2 ( Figure 2 and Figure S2).
